attributes.action: Extend Covid-restrictions past 19 July 2021 following a drastic rise in cases
attributes.additional_details: Reconsider lifting ALL restrictions on 19th July 2021, and keeping preventative measures in place such as face masks on public transport and social distancing in indoor spaces.
attributes.background: There is evidence that the Covid vaccine does not provide immunity to contracting the virus, and since July 2021 there has been a rise in cases above 30,000 for the first time since January. It is simply too early, and would be a step backwards in lifting all restrictions so soon.
